original_text: Whoever is among you of all his people, may his God be with him, and let him go up to Jerusalem, which is in Judah, and rebuild the house of the Lord, the God of Israel—he is the God who is in Jerusalem.
korean_text: 이스라엘의 하나님은 참 신이시라 너희 중에 그의 백성 된 자는 다 유다 예루살렘으로 올라가서 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와의 성전을 건축하라 그는 예루살렘에 계신 하나님이시라

sentences.original_text: Whoever is among you of all his people
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 그의 모든 백성은 누구든지

sentences.original_text: may his God be with him
and let him go up to Jerusalem
and rebuild the house of the Lord
he is the God who is in Jerusalem
